page.title: 11TRAQUAIR CRAFTS
page.content: IN RECENT YEARS SEVERAL ARTISTS AND CRAFTSMEN HAVE BEEN ATTRACTED TO THIS AREA. IN THE GROUNDS OF TRAQUAIR HOUSE THERE ARE FIVE WORKSHOPS ; IN ONE THERE IS A POTTER, RAY WALLEY, IN ANOTHER THERE IS JOHN SCHOFIELD, A WOODTURNER, AND HIS APPRENTICE JAMIE BLAIR. THERE ARE ALSO CANDLEMAKERS, KEN AND SHEILA PARSONS, SILK SCREEN-PRINTERS BRIAN AND JEAN VAUGHAN AND ARTISTS IAN KAY, ANNABEL LE MAITRE AND ALAN SCOTT-MONCRIEFF. ALSO WORKING IN THE AREA ARE A WEAVER, BOB DALGLISH AND ANOTHER ARTIST, EILEEN SCOTT-MONCRIEFF.
